mapper.select:
select
from t_activity a LEFT JOIN t_personage p ON a.p_id = p.t_id
and a.p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.t_headline like CONCAT('%',#{tHeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by a.t_create_time desc

select
from t_activity a LEFT JOIN t_personage p ON a.p_id = p.openid where a.t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
delete from t_activity where t_id in
'${ids}'

update t_activity
t_headline = #{tHeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_content = #{tContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_start_time = #{tStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_end_time = #{tEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_create_time = #{tCreateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from t_activity a LEFT JOIN t_personage p ON a.p_id = p.t_id LEFT JOIN t_enshrine e ON a.t_id = e.h_id and e.p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where a.t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
